name: Shaka Baka
title: Budtender
coverLetter: I am Shabaka. Someone who's very comfortable with communicating and cooperating with customers, supervisors, and colleagues. I consider it a strong suit of mine to effectively assists guests in fast paced environments.  I display charisma and a great personality that makes anyone working with at ease. I am also good with math as well as cash handling. Along with being highly motivated, creative, resourceful, very reliable, and detail oriented; I professionally freelance as a photographer with any spare time that I do have.
